column1: swing back in straight up, length outside off, swung appreciably through the air, Lynn stays back and defends
length outside off, plenty of pace and bounce, left alone
Cleans him up and what a return for Varun aaron! Length outside off, nipped back in, skidded onto Lynn who went for the cut and chopped it back on
full on middle, Rana is rooted to the crease but defends safely back to the bowler presenting a straight bat
length on the pads, Rana deflects it fine to beat the diving keeper to his right and it races to the fine-leg fence
length on off, movement away off the seam and extra bounce, Rana withdraws his bat belatedly
full outside off, driven to mid-off
short ball outside off, Rana goes for the ramp over the keeper as a bit of an afterthought but misses
length outside off, it was a quick delivery with a hint of width and Rana waited for it nicely, just opened the face of the bat to guide it past point and it rocketed to the fence
short outside off, another attempted ramp, Rana seems keen to use Thomas' pace but can't make any connection this time either
length on middle, nips back in slightly, tucked away towards deep squareleg
length, angled in, Gill whips it away towards fine-leg's left, but the fielder gets around to keep him to one
length outside off, Gill stays back and defends towards cover
length outside off, half a stride forward and punched to cover-point
slower ball outside off, Gill was already on the move forward but adjusted his bat speed and defended it back to the bowler
length, angled in, tucked away towards squareleg for one
slower ball outside off, swerved away from Rana as he went for the expansive drive, nicked it behind but beat the diving slip fielder to his left for a single to third-man
length on middle, Rana turns the face of the bat too early and gets a leading edge that nearly carries to cover-point, He was hurried for pace there as well
short outside off and he cuts it hard, beating point to his left and the timing sublime
full on off, Gill comes forward and punches it straight to mid-off
length outside off, pushed to mid-off's left and they scamper one
length on middle, Rana stands tall and defends it back to the bowler
short ball at the body, Rana was caught in a bit of a tangle but managed to help it along to fine-leg off the glove
length on the pads, hurried for pace and misses the flick but the deflection off the pad down to fine-leg helps Rana retain strike
short at the body again, Rana in a better position to play the hook but doesn't time it perfectly, only a single to fine-leg
full outside off, squeezed away to third-man, there's a fumble on the boundary which allows Gill to come back for the second
slower ball, almost in the blockhole, Gill squeezes it out back to the bowler
short outside off, not too much width but it had the pace, Gill slashes it behind point and it rockets to the fence
length on middle, whipped away, with the bottom hand taking over, but straight to midwicket
he's bowled him with a beauty! Started well outside off and swung back in sharply as Gill came down on it with an angled bat, getting a slight inside edge back onto his stumps
length outside off, pace and extra bounce, Rana follows it with the bat and misses
length on the pads, Rana misses the flick, is struck on the thigh pad and they scamper one
length outside off, comes forward and defends solidly towards cover
length outside off, pushed to cover
length outside off, stays back and defends to point
length outside off, banged hard into the surface, Karthik stays back and pushes it to point
full outside off, comes forward, turns the face and pushes it to midwicket
length outside off, stays back and defends back to the bowler
full on middle, Rana comes down on one knee and sweeps it fine to turn the strike over
full on middle, Karthik goes for a premeditated reverse sweep, there's an appeal for lbw as he misses but would have probably missed leg as well
googly on middle, comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
another googly but short outside off, Rana goes deep in his crease and pulls it hard and flat in front of square but can't beat Ben Stokes at deep midwicket
short outside off, Rana rocks back and cuts it between point and short third-man
length on middle, tucked away towards midwicket for one
length on middle, Karthik misses it completely on the forward defence, but struck to high
length on middle, turns it around towards midwicket for one
length outside off, defended back to the bowler
full on middle, pushed to long-on for one
googly, starts around middle and spins away, left alone
another googly on off, Rana gets a hint of width as it spins away, goes for the cut but can't control it due to the extra bounce and ends up spooning a simple catch to cover point
full outside off, another googly, left alone
another googly on middle, Narine comes forward and defends to cover
length outside off, punched to cover
googly outside off, too full for the cut, Narine throws his bat at it and gets a bottom edge that races past slip and down to third-man for four
length on the pads, tucked away to squareleg for one
short ball straight up, pulled unconvincingly to deep squareleg for one. Could have gone anywhere
length on off, nips away off the seam, Karthik has a tentative poke and is beaten
short and angled across, karthik tries to fetch it for the pull, splices it up in the air, but luckily for him, doesn't carry to long-on
slower short one on middle, Narine fends it with his eyes off the ball, it misses everything, hits him flush on the helmet and balloons up in the air, but short of point
massive Karthik breaks the shackles, and that's a free gift of a ball too. Half-tracker that gave him plenty of time to rock back and smash it over square leg

outside edge goes for four. Nice comeback by the bowler, but good adjustment by Karthik too. Flighted outside off and he was coming forward to it, realises he's not to the pitch, and almost deliberately opens the face to run it down

misfield by Stuart Binny at deep midwicket this was sloppy. Karthik had worked this fuller one with his wrists and the ball wasn't travelling all that fast, but somehow Binny fumbles it and allows it to go through his legs for a boundary
smoked through extra cover now! Karthik has exploded in this over. Full toss outside off and he drives it powerfully
good length on off, he comes on the front foot to steer it to backward point
Narine gets into the act now. Shreyas is under pressure and he bowls one too full, perfectly in Narine's arc, and he slog-sweeps powerfully to send it soaring over the boundary. Huge over for KKR
flicked off his hips for six that is some exceptional timing. Back of a length on the hips and Karthik didn't seem to hit it with power, but timed it so well it flew off over deep square leg
full outside off, driven crisply, but straight to mid-off

that's poor running from Narine. good length coming in from outside off, Karthik has tucked this to deep square leg and it seemed like there was a two there, but Narine was very slow on his feet and he's well out of the crease at the non-striker's end when Aaron's throw comes in and Archer whips the bails off. What's more they ran one run short too, so quite a pointless wicket all around
good length outside off, defended to point
back of a length outside off, defended and it rolls to the keeper
back of a length on off, and he pulls it to midwicket, but he's slipped and fallen while hitting the shot. Luckily for him, doesn't hit the stumps, picks himself up and they take a single
short of length outside off, Karthik gets on his toes to steer it to third man
steps away to drive but Oshane fires in a full yorker, and he gets a thick outside edge that goes one bounce to third man
back of a length on leg, whipped off his hips to short fine leg
backs away and wanted to send this outside Eden, but swings and misses. Length ball outside off
pacy short ball at 143.4 kph outside off. Russell gets behind it and guides it to third man
length ball on the stumps, clipped towards mid-on
full outside off, driven to cover
slashed for six Aaron can do something wrong today too after all. Short ball outside off, but enough room for Karthik to cut it uppishly and all the way over point

great stop by Samson behind the stumps. Wide yorker, just inside the tram-line, another knuckle ball perhaps. Karthik throws his bat at it and gets an under edge that is travelling to Samson's right, but he dives and stops it. Would have been four otherwise
good length on the stumps, patted back
short on the stumps, and Karthik wants to pull forcefully off the back foot but gets it off the bottom half of the bat and it trickles to midwicket

too short and too wide outside off, too much room and Karthik won't miss out on that. Cuts it to the point fence with power and precision. Did that hamstring hurting play a part in Aaron bowling a poor ball?
yorker  at 148 kph on middle and Russell goes deep in his crease, gets behind and offers a full bat face
slower ball, good length outside off, chopped to third man. Think Russell had read it late, adjusted to play the shot
full on off, tailing in a bit, DK wanted to drive it through cover but gets an inside edge onto boot
fast and short, but wide down legside and he'll have to rebowl that
good length coming in from outside off, glided to third man
gave himself room and wanted to whack it over midwicket but gets a thick under-edge that Samson dives to his left to collect one-bounce

Binny has dropped Russell at deep point It's not been a good day for him. This was short and wide outside off and Russell had a good old thrash at it. Binny was in place for such a shot but ends up clanging it. How costly will that be?
bang first ball after being dropped, he gets a full one on the toes, clears his front leg and slams it over deep midwicket
intelligently bowled. slower bouncer going across him and Russell is too early into the pull, swings and misses
another slower back of length ball, only 115 kph. Russell goes deep and across and pulls it to long-on. Didn't time it perfectly
shot that is some peachy timing. DK has found his groove in this innings. Back of a length on the pads, he moves across and effortlessly flicks, carries all the way over deep square leg
good length on off, pushed to point for a quick run. Steve Smith fires in a throw but misses the stumps. Russell might have been in trouble if he had hit
the slower bouncer to Russell seems to be working. Another one angled across, and he has to wait for it, and can only do a tennis ball swat almost to deep midwicket
Short ball and Russell pulls again but without timing, deep midwicket collects
good length outside off, steered to third man and that's fifty for Karthik

straight up in the air and dropped for a second time Prashant Chopra, the substitute fielder was under it at point, doesn't get under it and ends up diving to his left and can't hold on. This was a length ball and Russell got a top edge off an intended pull, went swirling in the air. Plenty of time to catch it, or perhaps too much time, which resulted in the drop
good length on the pads, flicked to deep square

he's caught now Was dropped twice but not third-time lucky. Short ball on the stumps, he clears his front leg to pull. Like he has all through this innings, there's no timing at all on that, and perhaps the hurt wrist reduces power too. Ends up going off the toe-end to deep midwicket that Riyan Parag takes comfortably.
over-stepped. That was a good ball, yorker on off and Brathwaite, got behind it to push it past the bowler, which means Karthik will face the Free Hit
and he makes the free hit count, sending it just over a leaping Ben Stokes at long-on. Length ball and Karthik went back in his crease to create the room to swat it away

shovelled down to fine leg. Good length on leg stump, and Brathwaite was setting himself up for a big heave over midwicket, but uses his wrists to adjust at the last moment and get it past short fine leg

Rahane with a fine catch at deep midwicket the former Royals captain shows his team-mates how it's done. Length ball on the stumps, Brathwaite is targetting cow corner and over, but ends up getting a toe-end. Rahane runs to his right and tumbles forward to hold on to the catch
excellent placement from Karthik, this was a length ball going across and Karthik stayed still and beside it, cutting it past backward point

moved across  a long way looking for the paddle scoop but good bowling by Unadkat who fires it in quick and full at the batsman and Karthik can't connect. Rinku was rushing down from the other end but is sent back. The throw is a bit awry from the keeper, which allows him to scramble back
loses control of that slower one and pushes it well wide of off stump. Outside the tramlines and wide

Rahane with another fine effort but can't prevent the boundary stand and deliver shot by karthik, too short on the stumps and he swats it away. Rahane runs across and dives full length at square leg. Gets a hand to it but it doesn't stick on. What's worse, he appears to have hurt his shoulder. He's going off the field, rubbing and rotating his left shoulder
good length on the stumps, opens the face to steer it towards slip and they take a quick single
good length but on the pads, paddle-flicked to deep square
angling into him from around the wicket on a length, tucked off his pads to square leg
good length outside off, slashed away but Binny does well at backward point to go to his left and stop the ball
giving himself room to try and carve it into the offside, but Archer follows him with a pacy 146kph yorker length ball and he can only send it as far as the in-field
that is some swat Short ball outside off and he stands tall to slap it over extra cover. Such great timing that it carries all the way
slower ball, length on the stumps and DK moves across to pull it over the fielder at deep square. Excellent timing again.
back of a length outside off, mis-times the pull to long-on
shot. Stayed deep in his crease and picked up this full length ball from the stumps, to power it to the midwicket boundary. Unadkat was looking for the yorker, but didn't get it

smashed. Karthik's gone to his highest IPL score at 90. He's batting very deep in his crease and Unadkat is not getting his yorkers right. DK stays back and power-drives it over long-on with a lot of bottom hand
good length on the pads, and he's flicked it to deep square but declines the single.
demolished. Unadkat misses the yorker again, too full and Karthik powers this straight back past the bowler and over the sightscreen

doesn't connect with the pull, and midwicket collects it on the bounce. So Karthik finishes on 97, but he's played a magnificent hand. This was a length ball - Unadkat finally abandoned trying for the yorker - and a slower one on leg stump
full and outside off, hint of swing away, left alone
length outside off, opens the face and steers to point
length outside off, nips back in as Rahane looks to cut, only manages to chop it away to cover-point
length outside off and Rahane lofts it over cover-point this time, times it well and it goes into the boundary on the bounce
length on the pads, tucked away towards squareleg
length outside off, shapes away slightly but left alone
full on off, late swing away for Krishna, Rahane watches it closely, opens the face and pushes it to cover
length on off and Rahane goes through the line, picking it over mid-on for four
length outside off, quicker deliver that jagged back in off the seam but Rahane waits for it and steers it down to third-man
length on middle, Samson smacks this down the ground, and it carries all the way even as the bat turns in his hand upon contact with the ball
full outside off, driven on the up towards point, who dives to right to save what could have been another boundary
length on middle, Samson helps it along to deep squareleg with the angle but without much timing
length outside off, extra bounce but Samson gets on his toes and steers it down to third-man
length outside off, Rahane stands tall, opens the face and times the ball sublimely, bisecting point and cover-point
length, angled in, takes the thigh pad on the way to the diving keeper down the leg side
length outside off, punched to deep cover
full and floated up on off, Samson launches it down-town, over Russell's head and into the pavilion area for six
short ball on middle, Samson swivels and pulls this along the ground to deep squareleg
full on the pads, tucked away to deep squareleg
length on the pads, Rahane sweeps it fine for one
length on the pads, tucked away to deep squareleg again
length on middle, Rahane skips down the wicket and turns it to the leg side for one
length outside off, quicker delivery, punched to extra cover
length on middle, whips it away through midwicket for two
length, angled across, steered to short third-man, it was timed well but couldn't find the gap
short outside off, too much room and Rahane shows that he has the power game in addition to the paint brush, slashes this over cover point and it goes deep into the stands
short on middle and he targets the exact opposite side of the field, swivels and pulls this flat and hard to deep squareleg for four
length outside off and caressed through cover-point this time and it races to the fence. Rahane has simply taken off from his hundred in the last match, if anything, he's batting even better
full outside off, driven to mid-off's left for a couple as Russell is slow to get to it
length on the pads, tucked away towards squareleg for one
length on middle, sharp turn back in to Rahane, hurried onto him as well and struck on the thigh pad

against the run of play, Narine strikes! Full on middle, Rahane plants his front foot forward and has to play around it as it turn back in a touch, struck him above the knee roll but Rahane chose not to review
length. fired in on leg stump, Smith pulls it along the ground to deep backward squareleg
quicker one on middle, pushed to long-on
short outside off, Smith goes for the full blooded cut but beaten by the bounce

Is that two in the over for Narine? Straighter delivery on middle, Smith goes for the slog sweep and misses completely, seems to be struck plumb in front, given not out and KKR review immediately. Everything looked good till the inside edge showed up on the replay and KKR lose their review
quicker one, angled in, tickled straight to short fine-leg
full on the pads, clipped through midwicket and that's good for two
through the gate and Samson goes! Went really wide to deliver that, it was the googly, Samson was already shaping to sweep, got done in by the length, and bowled through the gate
quicker one on the pads, Stokes opens his account with a reverse sweep, manages to clear short fine-leg and get to to the other end
quicker one on middle, goes back and punches it to long-on for one
googly, Stokes plants his foot forward and tries to turn it towards midwicket, gets the outside edge, which eludes the slip fielder diving to his left
full outside off, driven straight to extra cover

plays all around a straight one! Straighter one on middle, Smith went back and tried to turn it to the leg side, it was much too full for the stroke, hurried onto him and was through him before he knew it
appeal for lbw turned down! Length on middle, plats his frontfoot and has to play around it, gets an inside edge back onto the pad
length on off, pushed to cover
Narine drops a dolly! Tossed up on off, he was early into the drive, pushed it gently back to the bowler but Narine was a little lazy to get his hands in the right postion and put it down
length outside off, rocks back and punches through cover-point, the fielder on the boundary makes good ground to his left to keep them to three
googly on middle, tries to work it on side, another leading edge towards cover
full on off, pushed towards mid-off for one
googly, slog and nearly crashes into the stumps. It was generously tossed up inviting the stroke but he missed it completely
full on the pads, pushed to long-on
googly around leg stump, Stokes goes for the reverse sweep, can't connect properly and it balloons off the glove but eludes slip
quicker one outside off, steered to short third-man
length outside off, too wide and left alone
length outside off, steered to third-man
length on the pads, swings and misses, takes the pad on the way to the keeper
length outside off, Stokes makes room and swats it over extra cover
length on off, changes his pace as Stokes comes down the wicker, spotted by Stokes, as he just pushes it towards covers with soft hands for one
short ball around leg stump, goes for the hook shot but misses
full on the pads, whipped away aerially over midwicket and the timing is excellent, couple of bounces into the boundary

Russell's caught it on the boundary Ben Stokes ends a disappointing IPL season. Backed away but Chawla followed him, bowled a wrong un though, and Stokes is looking to heave it over cow corner, gets a toe-end. Russell at long-on times his jump perfectly to hold on, and keeps his balance when landing on the ground so that he doesn't cross the rope
good length outside off, comes on the front foot to work it  to fine leg
another googly, slightly back of length outside off and turning in, clipped to the bowler's right
goes for a sweep to one fullish outside off, but only gets a faint touch off th etoe end as the ball trickles back to the bowler
out of the screws. Binny has played some fine cameos for Royals and he shows why. Slog-swept into oblivion, several rows back over midwicket
fuller, jabbed back
strays down leg and that will be a wide
goes down leg once again, another wide
back of a length, coming into him, tucked to square leg
yorker, from slightly wide of the crease, clipped to mid-on
comes back in sharply from a length outside off, he was looking to whip it but it hits thigh pad and rolls towards gully
digs it in short, angling into him from slightly wider again, he goes for the pull but doesn't time it that well. One bounce to deep square and some sloppy work to concede an overthrow
and that's the third wide of the over, Brathwait struggling to control his lines. Full and down leg again
back of a length hoicked to deep square

quicker bouncer but the batsman's going to get a boundary off it, though it was well directed. Rising up to his helmet and he wants to pull, but gets a top edge that flies over the keeper and to the fine leg boundary
that's a nicely executed sweep by Binny. Quicker outside off, and he stretches out to paddle-sweep it very fine
googly, and on a length, he goes deep in his crease to whip it to short fine

caught on the deep midwicket boundary Binny hit it really well, but picked out the man with precision. Full and in the slot to slog sweep, he nails it too. Unfortunately for him, doesn't place it well
googly first up, he goes back and whips to midwicket
another googly, on a length, he covers the stumps and gets nicely behind it to block

almost carries back to Chawla googly, held up in the surface and he was early into the punch. The ball pops in the air and is coming down. Chawla dives forward on his follow through to try and pick it up, but it touches the turf first. Still, it's been an excellent day for him, 3-20 in four overs
another one pops back to the bowler, but this is well short of Russell. Length ball on the stumps, punched tentatively, Russell takes it on the bounce
makes room and squirts this full ball outside off over point. The man at sweeper cover runs to his left to cut it off
innovative. Moves very far across the stumpsand paddles it to the fine leg fence from the fifth stump line

that's pinged him on the helmet effort ball from Russell, who wouldn't have taken too kindly to the last shot. Digs it in short and quick, and Parag is very late on the pull, gets a crack on the right side of the helmet
good length outside off, slashed to deep cover
beautiful too full on off and Shreyas gets his front leg out of the way and punch-drives it to the extra cover boundary. Super shot, super timing
good length outside off, pushed to extra cover
quicker but dragged down short, and clipped to midwicket
down the track, but well done by Rana to fire it into the blockhole, and then get a hand to the drive. Parried onto stumps, but the bails didn't come off. The non-striker was in too
width outside off and Shreyas unleashes a nice looking cut shot to send the ball screaming to the boundary at point
too short again and he takes advantage. Rocks back and pulls this to dep square leg's left. No chance for the fielder

hat-trick of fours the gamble to give Nitish an over has not worked. too full this time and Shreyas is almost predicting where the ball will be. Into position early to take a half step down and drive it beautifully through extra cover
back of a length outside off, chopped to cover

holes out to long-off. Not quite full enough to go for the lofted drive, and too close to the body too. Gets it off the outside half of the bat and Gill sprints in from long-off to catch it comfortably

back o fa length coming in from outside off, he taps it into the legside rising high on his toes and they take a quick single. Prasidh goes across to his right to field but decides against having a shy
back of a length and coming into him, Archer's at the receiving end of a 145 kph ball this time, and he jabs it back to the bowler
digs it in too short and it sails over the batsman's head. Will be wide
back of a length again, but Archer's ready this time and swivels to pull this to the midwicket boundary
yorker on the stumps, clipped off his toes to deep square
swatted down the ground given room to free his arms outside off and he smashes it with a horizontal bat straight back
leading edge that falls in no-man's land at cover. He was moving across to flick it to leg, but didn't read the spin
comes forward and clips it between long and on deep midwicket
quicker one but strays on the pads and Riyan does superbly to just tickle it fine
good length outside off, he gets down low and cuts it to the sweeper on the cover fence
back of a length, and Archer swipes it to deep midwicket off the back foot
blasted this full delivery from the stumps but straight to Narine at mid-off. He was moving to his left and the ball hits his boot
has a big thrash at that towards long-on but doesn't time it, and it rolls along the ground to the fielder there
nicely timed but there is a man on the cover boundary. Full toss outside off, punched
inside edge goes for four He was moving across and wanted to smash this to cow corner but gets an inside edge. Luck is on his side, it goes very fine for a boundary
excellent comeback by Prasidh, wide yorker, out of the batsman's reach and within the tram-lines. Riyan was moreover giving himself room so he had to really stretch out to try and get bat on that.
smoked goes for the aggressive option of bowling a bouncer, but Riyan - with a cool belying his years - just rocks back and pulls it high and handsome, way over deep square leg
too short and he pulls it well, but there is a deep midwicket
yorker on the fifth stump line, steered to deep point
pacy short ball, Archer goes to pull but gets it high on the bat and it goes to long-off

Riyan Parag is turning it on He's a teenager and he's just hit IPL 2019's MVP for a six over long-on, even though it wasn't perfectly timed. Own medicine and all that for Russell. Brathwaite at long-on was interested and leapt up, but the ball went over him

oh dear he's out hit-wicket. Short ball and he was moving inside the line to pull it fine, but doesn't connect with the ball. In the follow through his bat hits the top of the stumps. unfortunate end to an impressive innings.
length ball on the stumps, swiped, but gets it only till mid-off
outside edge flies for four! Length ball outside off, Archer goes really hard at it, wanted to go over extra cover, but it takes the edge and goes to third man

Archer's done it! His final act in IPL 2019 is hitting an extra cover drive off a full ball for six, while giving himself room. Full ball and he shows his extraordinary timing, and sending it zipping through the air and over the boundary. Pick him for the World Cup already, England! Just do it.
